titleStmt.title: A copy of an award referring to the publick markets of the city of London
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Shower, Bartholomew, Sir, 1658-1701.
Wright, Nathan, Sir, 1654-1721.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the request and for the information of the market-people,

notesStmt.note: "Signed, sealed, published and declared by the said Sir Nathan Wright and Sir Bartholomew Shower for and as their award, the same being duly stamped in the presence of Randolph Stracey, Stephen Johnson."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
